Name: Bala na manga
About the game: A mobster stole you, get back what's yours in turn based duels !! You must choose between to shoot, to reload or to dodge. -Funny characters. - Don't waste your bullets. - Reload when safe. - Dodge when in disadvantage. - Local achievements system. A simple game !!
